text: Anton Pius Riegel (1789-?) was an Austrian architect of the 19th century. He is known for his design of the György Károlyi palace in Budapest Hungary (now housing the Hungarian Museum of Literature) and the mansion of Dolná Krupá in Slovakia. ==References== * Museum of Literature * Jana Šulcová - Drei Kapitel aus der Baugeschichte des Schlosses Dolná Krupá Category:1789 births Category:19th-century deaths Category:Austrian architects Category:Year of death unknown
title: Anton Pius Riegel
